verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יָבֹ֧א <WH935> shall not enter פְצֽוּעַ־ <WH6481> one דַּכָּ֛א <WH1795> wounded וּכְר֥וּת <WH3772> cut off שָׁפְכָ֖ה <WH8212> or hath his privy member בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> No יָבֹ֥א <WH935> shall not enter מַמְזֵ֖ר <WH4464> A bastard בִּקְהַ֣ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD גַּ֚ם <WH1571> of his even דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> generation עֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> even to his tenth לֹא־ <WH3808> none יָ֥בֹא <WH935> shall he not enter ל֖וֹ בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יָבֹ֧א <WH935> shall not enter עַמּוֹנִ֛י <WH5984> An Ammonite וּמוֹאָבִ֖י <WH4125> or Moabite בִּקְהַ֣ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD גַּ֚ם <WH1571> of their even דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> generation עֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> even to their tenth לֹא־ <WH3808> none יָבֹ֥א <WH935> shall they not enter לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

עַל־ <WH5921> against דְּבַ֞ר <WH1697> Because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and because לֹא־ <WH3808> did not קִדְּמ֤וּ <WH6923> they met אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּלֶּ֣חֶם <WH3899> you not with bread וּבַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> and with water בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֣ם <WH3318> when ye came forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> and because שָׂכַ֨ר <WH7936> and because they hired עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְעָ֣ם <WH1109> against thee Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּע֗וֹר <WH1160> of Beor מִפְּת֛וֹר <WH6604> of Pethor אֲרַ֥ם נַהֲרַ֖יִם <WH763> of Mesopotamia לְקַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <WH7043> to curse

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֞ה <WH14> would יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Nevertheless the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam וַיַּהֲפֹךְ֩ <WH2015> turned יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> but the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֧יךָ <WH430> thy God לְּךָ֛ אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> the curse לִבְרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> into a blessing כִּ֥י <WH3588> because אֲהֵֽבְךָ֖ <WH157> loved יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto thee because the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> Thou shalt not seek שְׁלֹמָ֖ם <WH7965> their peace וְטֹבָתָ֑ם <WH2896> nor their prosperity כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמֶ֖יךָ <WH3117> all thy days לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תְתַעֵ֣ב <WH8581> Thou shalt not abhor אֲדֹמִ֔י <WH130> an Edomite כִּ֥י <WH3588> because אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> for he [is] thy brother ה֑וּא <WH1931> he ס לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תְתַעֵ֣ב <WH8581> thou shalt not abhor מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> an Egyptian כִּי־ <WH3588> because גֵ֖ר <WH1616> because thou wast a stranger הָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become בְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> in his land

בָּנִ֛ים <WH1121> The children אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִוָּלְד֥וּ <WH3205> that are begotten לָהֶ֖ם דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> generation שְׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> in their third יָבֹ֥א <WH935> of them shall enter לָהֶ֖ם בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> goeth forth מַחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> When the host עַל־ <WH5921> against אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> against thine enemies וְנִ֨שְׁמַרְתָּ֔ <WH8104> then keep מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> every דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thing רָֽע׃ <WH7451> thee from every wicked

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> If there be among you any man אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> is not טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> that is not clean מִקְּרֵה־ <WH7137> by reason of uncleanness that chanceth לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> him by night וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> then shall he go אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> abroad לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> out of the camp לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָבֹ֖א <WH935> he shall not come אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the camp

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לִפְנֽוֹת־ <WH6437> cometh on עֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> But it shall be when evening יִרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> he shall wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> [himself] with water וּכְבֹ֣א <WH935> is down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> and when the sun יָבֹ֖א <WH935> he shall come אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה׃ <WH4264> the camp

וְיָד֙ <WH3027> Thou shalt have a place also תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have לְךָ֔ מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the camp וְיָצָ֥אתָ <WH3318> whither thou shalt go forth שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there חֽוּץ׃ <WH2351> abroad

וְיָתֵ֛ד <WH3489> And thou shalt have a paddle תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall have לְךָ֖ עַל־ <WH5921> among אֲזֵנֶ֑ךָ <WH240> upon thy weapon וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall have בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֣ <WH3427> and it shall be when thou wilt ease ח֔וּץ <WH2351> thyself abroad וְחָפַרְתָּ֣ה <WH2658> thou shalt dig בָ֔הּ וְשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH7725> therewith and shalt turn back וְכִסִּ֥יתָ <WH3680> and cover אֶת־ <WH853> צֵאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6627> that which cometh

כִּי֩ <WH3588> Since יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ ׀ <WH1980> walketh בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in the midst מַחֲנֶ֗ךָ <WH4264> of thy camp לְהַצִּֽילְךָ֙ <WH5337> to deliver וְלָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> thee and to give up אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH341> thine enemies לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become מַחֲנֶ֖יךָ <WH4264> thee therefore shall thy camp קָד֑וֹשׁ <WH6918> be holy וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> must not יִרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> that he see בְךָ֙ עֶרְוַ֣ת <WH6172> no unclean דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> thing וְשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> in thee and turn away מֵאַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH310> from thee ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַסְגִּ֥יר <WH5462> Thou shalt not deliver עֶ֖בֶד <WH5650> the servant אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֲדֹנָ֑יו <WH113> unto his master אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִנָּצֵ֥ל <WH5337> which is escaped אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> from his master

עִמְּךָ֞ <WH5973> with יֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> He shall dwell בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <WH7130> with thee [even] among בַּמָּק֧וֹם <WH4725> you in that place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> which he shall choose בְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> in one שְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH8179> of thy gates בַּטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> where it liketh him best ל֑וֹ לֹ֖א <WH3808> shall not תּוֹנֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3238> thou shalt not oppress ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> None תִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall be no קְדֵשָׁ֖ה <WH6948> There shall be no whore מִבְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall be a קָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6945> nor a sodomite מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons יִשְׂרָאֵל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָבִיא֩ <WH935> Thou shalt not bring אֶתְנַ֨ן <WH868> the hire זוֹנָ֜ה <WH2181> of a whore וּמְחִ֣יר <WH4242> or the price כֶּ֗לֶב <WH3611> of a dog בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לְכָל־ <WH3605> any נֶ֑דֶר <WH5088> for any vow כִּ֧י <WH3588> of these תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> these [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God גַּם־ <WH1571> even שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> for even both

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַשִּׁ֣יךְ <WH5391> Thou shalt not lend upon usury לְאָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> to thy brother נֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH5392> usury כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of money נֶ֣שֶׁךְ <WH5392> usury אֹ֑כֶל <WH400> of victuals נֶ֕שֶׁךְ <WH5392> usury כָּל־ <WH3605> anything דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> of any thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יִשָּֽׁךְ׃ <WH5391> that is lent upon usury

לַנָּכְרִ֣י <WH5237> Unto a stranger תַשִּׁ֔יךְ <WH5391> thou mayest lend upon usury וּלְאָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> but unto thy brother לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַשִּׁ֑יךְ <WH5391> thou shalt not lend upon usury לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so יְבָרֶכְךָ֜ <WH1288> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH4916> thee in all that thou settest יָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> in הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> to in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תִדֹּ֥ר <WH5087> When thou shalt vow נֶ֙דֶר֙ <WH5088> a vow לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְאַחֵ֖ר <WH309> thou shalt not slack לְשַׁלְּמ֑וֹ <WH7999> to pay כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When דָּרֹ֨שׁ <WH1875> will surely יִדְרְשֶׁ֜נּוּ <WH1875> require יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> it for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> it of thee and it would be sin
וְכִ֥י <WH3588> if תֶחְדַּ֖ל <WH2308> But if thou shalt forbear לִנְדֹּ֑ר <WH5087> to vow לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> it shall be no sin

מוֹצָ֥א <WH4161> That which is gone out שְׂפָתֶ֖יךָ <WH8193> of thy lips תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> thou shalt keep וְעָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> and perform כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what נָדַ֜רְתָּ <WH5087> according as thou hast vowed לַיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God נְדָבָ֔ה <WH5071> [even] a freewill offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> which thou hast promised בְּפִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> with thy mouth ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תָבֹא֙ <WH935> When thou comest בְּכֶ֣רֶם <WH3754> vineyard רֵעֶ֔ךָ <WH7453> into thy neighbour's וְאָכַלְתָּ֧ <WH398> then thou mayest eat עֲנָבִ֛ים <WH6025> grapes כְּנַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> at thine own pleasure שָׂבְעֶ֑ךָ <WH7648> thy fill וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> about כֶּלְיְךָ֖ <WH3627> [any] in thy vessel לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> but thou shalt not put ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תָבֹא֙ <WH935> When thou comest בְּקָמַ֣ת <WH7054> into the standing corn רֵעֶ֔ךָ <WH7453> of thy neighbour וְקָטַפְתָּ֥ <WH6998> then thou mayest pluck מְלִילֹ֖ת <WH4425> the ears בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> with thine hand וְחֶרְמֵשׁ֙ <WH2770> a sickle לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תָנִ֔יף <WH5130> but thou shalt not move עַ֖ל <WH5921> and קָמַ֥ת <WH7054> standing corn רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> unto thy neighbour's ס
